name: ShhhCat
description:
!Please read!

ShhhCat is a game in which you play a cat that wants 

to prevent the owner from waking up, so you have to avoid and stop any loud noise.

When playing, you have  

to pay close attention to the sounds that warn you of loud events!

Sometimes you have to think carefully about how to solve a problem,  

many game overs are normal here!

It can also happen that you can no longer win this round with a decision you make later.

Most events are triggered in random order, so each playthrough is individual!

Controlls

ArrowsKeys: Move

E: Drag objects with your tongue (Only if you are not in the air!)
